channel.title: Renate Reinsve on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Renate Reinsve on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Why Joachim Trier Dropped the Irony in ‘Sentimental Value’: “I Had to Be a Better Director”
item.description: With his new film, the Danish-Norwegian director plays it straight for an emotionally direct family drama: “With this one, I needed to talk about intimate, more tender things.”

item.title: Why Joachim Trier Dropped the Irony in ‘Sentimental Value’: “I Had to Be a Better Director”
item.description: With his new film, the Danish-Norwegian director plays it straight for an emotionally direct family drama: “With this one, I needed to talk about intimate, more tender things.”

item.title: Oscars: Norway Picks Joachim Trier’s Family Drama ‘Sentimental Value’ for Best Int’l Feature Race
item.description: Renate Reinsve, Stellan Skarsgard, Elle Fanning, and newcomer Inga Ibsdotter Lilleaas star in the feature, which won the Grand Prix honor in Cannes.
